original_text: And when he polled his head, (for it was at every year's end that he polled it: because the hair was heavy on him, therefore he polled it:) he weighed the hair of his head at two hundred shekels after the king's weight.
korean_text: 그의 머리털이 무거우므로 연말마다 깎았으며 그의 머리 털을 깎을 때에 그것을 달아본즉 그의 머리털이 왕의 저울로 이백 세겔이었더라

sentences.original_text: And when he polled his head
for it was at every year's end that he polled it:
because hair was heavy on him
he weighed the hair of his head
at two hundred shekels after the king's weight
